## Vec4.setRGBAColor() method

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setRGBAColor(_packedRGBA: number, _normalize?: boolean): Vec4<TArray>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  \_packedRGBA | number | The number to be unpacked. |
|  \_normalize | boolean | If true, normalize components between 0 - 1. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[Vec4](./rc-js-util.vec4.md)<!-- -->&lt;TArray&gt;
